description: The Tidepool Minnow is a small, aquatic creature commonly found in shallow tidepools along rocky coastlines. It is known for its vibrant scales that shimmer in sunlight, making it a favorite among fishermen and collectors. Despite its small size, it is incredibly fast and can dart between rocks to evade predators.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the Tidepool Minnow is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Aquatic Camouflage
traits.description: The Tidepool Minnow has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in aquatic environments.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage.
